Joe, ICMA sells the materials you are looking for as a textbook, a self study course and study guide w/examination.
Here are the links to purchase:
http://bookstore.icma.org/Local_Government_Police_Manage_P1063.cfm
http://bookstore.icma.org/Local_Government_Police_Manage_P1061C16.cfm
http://bookstore.icma.org/Local_Government_Police_Manage_P1097.cfm
If you are just looking for an examination, you can find that in the study guide available for members at $46.
